messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Computer Game Cluster Packs
messages.msgSnippet: ... I saw that last collection in the Walmart flyer for $10 I think! Maybe $19.99...that sortta makes more sense...being in Canada and all. I found Oregon
messages.messageBody:
Danielle writes:
>After School Clubhouse, includes Cluefinders, Zoombinis Island Odyssey and the Oregon >Trail-- $18.64
>
>Kids Collection, includes Sim Theme Park, Island Extreme Stunts, Soccer Mania, Sim >Safari, Sim Town and Sim Coaster-- $16.87
>
>
I saw that last collection in the Walmart flyer for $10 I think! Maybe $19.99...that sortta makes more sense...being in Canada and all. I found Oregon trail and Africa Trial bundled at Winners last August marked down to 5 bucks in a summer clearence bin and just picked up some bundled D&k software (Magical adventures of Oz, amazing Animals, & Human body Explorer) for $10.
Just had to brag.
I AM looking for Castles II and saw online ads for it in a big bundle pack and have yet to find the first Zoombinis.

Dawn (in NS)

messages.subject: Computer Game Cluster Packs
messages.msgSnippet: Got some great deals on cluster packs of computer games at Sam s Club today. They re pretty hit and miss, but often big shipments get split around the country
messages.messageBody:
Got some great deals on cluster packs of computer games at Sam's Club today. They're pretty hit and miss, but often big shipments get split around the country so those of you who have Sam's memberships might be able to find them too.

Super Strategy, includes Majesty, Civilization II, Ages of Empires Gold Edition and Risk II-- $13.82

After School Clubhouse, includes Cluefinders, Zoombinis Island Odyssey and the Oregon Trail-- $18.64

Kids Collection, includes Sim Theme Park, Island Extreme Stunts, Soccer Mania, Sim Safari, Sim Town and Sim Coaster-- $16.87

Just thought I'd pass it along, cause I'm pretty psyched!

--daniell

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
